name: Breakout
description:
Breakout is the low poly, atmospheric, First-Person platformer that will prove how good your reflexes really are.
Accept the challenge: run, jump, crouch and use special abilities to dodge the obstacles in order to complete each level, put your name on the top of the leader boards and, the most important thing, win awesome prizes.Key features:
A campaign mode with 70 levelsSpecial abilities like: Slow Motion, Grappling Hook, Jetpack and many moreAwesome prizes waiting for those who will finish the main challengeOnline leader boardsFor everyone: enjoyable by a wide variety of player skill
